title: NBA playoffs, MLB, Baker Mayfield, Packers
itunes:title: NBA playoffs, MLB, Baker Mayfield, Packers
description:
Colin explains why he is for a World Cup playoff format in the NBA, why MLB fans need to relax, why Baker Mayfield is basically Case Keenum, and the Packers biggest weakness. Guests include Nick Wright, Matt Nagy, John Smoltz, and Kevin O'Connor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
